entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Lake Airport 09:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: N 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or flurries. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. Forecast issued 06:03 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 06:03 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:03 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
